# underlyingError

**Instance Property**

The error that was encountered in an underlying implementation and caused the error that the receiver represents to occur.

## Declaration

```swift
readonly attribute NSError underlyingError;
```

## Getting Error Properties

- **code**: The error code.
- **domain**: A string containing the error domain.
- **userInfo**: The user info dictionary.

items.description: A string containing the error domain.
items.name: domain
